name: Veengle
overview:
Video Mingle Engine - Create your own video compilations

Founded in November 2010, Veengle.com is a new, fun way to share videos with others. During phase one all users will be able to access through one website the worldâ€™s most popular online video communities, allowing millions of people to discover, watch and share originally created videos with or without an account.

With our simple to use Video Editor, you can now add videos to your compilation, set start and stop time, change the transition theme even change the actual color of your video. All these with our simple and easy to use functions of our video editor.

Veengle.com also provides live comment feeds from popular social network platforms so everyone can see what other people think about their search results.

During Beta stage, Veengle.com will handle only youtube videos. When the full version is ready, users will be able to upload their videos directly to Veengle. So, why not trying something new? Show your friends your own video chart and do the â€œDirectorâ€™s cutâ€ yourself!
